scripts.migrate: npm run lint && truffle migrate --network ganache
scripts.migrate:reset: npm run clean && npm run lint && truffle migrate --reset --network ganache
scripts.migrate:staging: npm run lint && truffle migrate --network rinkeby && npm run copy:staging
scripts.migrate:reset:staging: npm run clean && npm run lint && truffle migrate --reset --network rinkeby && npm run copy:staging
scripts.migrate:production: npm run lint && truffle migrate --network mainnet && npm run copy:production
scripts.migrate:reset:production: npm run clean && npm run lint && truffle migrate --reset --network mainnet && npm run copy:production
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:sol
